name: VQ Communications
overview:
VQ Communications manufacture next generation video conferencing service delivery software.

As video conferencing continues on the path to become a mainstream business tool, large user of video conferencing need tools to help them scale without having the expensive burden of continually adding more staff.

VQ Conference Manager automates, schedules, monitors, manages and reports on multi-vendor, multi-tenanted large video conference deployments. Driving up end user usage and productivity, giving the end user a robust conferencing experience and optimizing their return on investment.

VQ Conference Manager has a robust API that allows integration into other business productivity tools and allows third party developers to remove some of the complexity around interop with video conferencing manufacturers.

VQ Communications customers are some of the most advanced users of video conferencing in the world. Divided between large enterprise and video managed service providers.
